summary: קורס CDAiO – מחזור 14 הוא מסלול ייחודי המיועד להכשרת מנהלי דאטה, בינה מלאכותית ואנליטיקה (Chief Data, AI & Analytics Officers). הקורס מתקיים במסגרת בית הספר להייטק וסייבר של אוניברסיטת בר-אילן, המהווה נקודת מפגש בין האקדמיה לתעשייה. הקורס כולל 27 מפגשים מקצועיים ושני מפגשי העשרה, ומטרתו להקנות ידע מעמיק בנושאים כמו אסטרטגיית דאטה, ניהול דאטה, משילות נתונים, פרטיות ורגולציה, למידת מכונה, טרנספורמציה דיגיטלית, מוניטיזציה של דאטה, וניהול פרויקטים מתקדם. סביבת הלמידה משלבת כיתות פיזיות עם ציוד מולטימדיה מתקדם ולמידה היברידית, לצד קבוצות ווצאפ, קישורים לזום, כונן דרייב עם חומרים מוקלטים, ועוד. הקורס מועבר על ידי צוות מרצים בכירים מהתעשייה, ומציע תעודה יוקרתית של אוניברסיטת בר-אילן. בנוסף, הקורס כולל עבודה מסכמת שמטרתה ליישם את הנושאים הנלמדים, עם אפשרות לשיתוף פעולה עם MIT Chief Data Officer and Information Quality Symposium.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: קורס CDO – CDAiO מחזור 14

COURSE OVERVIEW: The CDO – CDAiO course is designed to bridge the gap between academia and industry, providing a unique and innovative learning framework. The program aims to equip participants with the knowledge and skills necessary to integrate, advance, and excel in the high-tech and cyber industries. The course offers hybrid learning opportunities, international certifications, and career development workshops, ensuring a comprehensive educational experience.

TARGET AUDIENCE: Not explicitly mentioned.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: 
- Eran Shaham: Manager of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security. Contact: eran.shaham@biu.ac.il, 050-6560666.
- Esther Agaiev: Course Coordinator. Contact: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il, 052-5886002.
- Ido Biger: CDAiO Track Leader, EVP, CIO – Delek US, and CEO at DK. Formerly CDO at ELAL Israel Airlines and Head of Data at Yes.
- Lior Israeli: CDAiO Track Leader, Head of Data, AI & Analytics – Circles Ai. Formerly Manager of Data & AI Strategy at Deloitte. Contact: lior.israeli@gmail.com, 052-2553468.
- Oren Mizrahi: Lecturer in AI/ML, Data Science & CDO Operational Management. VP, Chief Data & Analytics Officer at Menora Mivtachim.
- Einat Shimoni: Lecturer in CDO, Data & AI Literacy. EVP Researcher of Technology Trends at STKI.
- Itay Hazan: Lecturer in Data Monetization. CFO at PayBox. Formerly Strategic Director at Oracle.
- Alon Schwartz: Lecturer in Digital Transformation and Data. Head of Data, Analytics, and AI at Proceed.
- Oren Harel: Lecturer in Data Governance Technologies. Consultant in Data Management and Governance.
- Tani Shapira: Lecturer, Privacy Protection Expert, and DPO.
- Hillel Koberovsky: Lecturer in Cyber Security and Career Management.
- Dor Eliav: Lecturer in Effective Presentations and Public Speaking.
- Oren Yeager: Lecturer in Cloud Transformation and Architecture, CISO.

PREREQUISITES: Not explicitly mentioned.

CERTIFICATIONS: International certifications from EC-Council, VMware, Fortinet, ISACA, AWS.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: November 4, 2024.
- End Date: February 4, 2025.
- Duration: 27 professional sessions + 2 enrichment sessions.
- Schedule: Mondays and Thursdays, 17:30–21:30. Two 15-minute breaks per session.
- Enrichment sessions on other weekdays as announced.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Physical Learning Environment: 
  - Classrooms: Building 403, Building 505.
  - Protected Space: Building 404, Floor 1.
  - Coffee Corner: Building 403, Floor 1, near Room 68.
  - Cafeteria: Across the path between Buildings 403 and 404.
  - Vending Machines: Entrances to Buildings 404 and 504.
  - Parking: Paid parking available at 20₪ per evening or 300₪ for the course duration.
- Digital Learning Environment: 
  - WhatsApp group for the class.
  - Permanent Zoom link.
  - Drive folder with lecture recordings, presentations, and additional materials.
  - Course contact list.
  - Classroom WiFi settings.
  - Alumni group post-course.

TUITION AND FEES: 
- Parking fees: 20₪ per evening or 300₪ for the course duration.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Data & Insights Driven Organization.
- The CDAiO Roles, Responsibilities, and Agenda Overview.
- Data Strategy Building Process, Management, and Measurement.
- Data Platform & Architecture.
- Cloud Journey and Security.
- Data Strategy in the Cloud.
- Data Privacy & Regulations.
- Organizational Data Governance.
- The Data Analyst.
- Data Visualization & Storytelling.
- Data Science Life Cycle and Machine Learning.
- Data Science Operation Management.
- Data Governance Management Technologies.
- Generative AI Projects.
- Data Monetization.
- Executive Look at Modern Project Management with AI as Co-Pilot.
- Data & AI Literacy.
- CDAiO Final Project & Summary Lecture.
- Career Management & LinkedIn Appearance.
- Building a Winning Presentation & Persuasive Speeches.
- Advanced Project Management Aimed for Data Products.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- Course Coordinator: Esther Agaiev. Contact: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il, 052-5886002.
- Parking registration: Contact the course coordinator with vehicle details.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: 
- School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University.
- The Center for Designated Programs.
- Partnerships with leading companies: EC-Council, VMware, Fortinet, ISACA, AWS.
- Collaboration with MIT Chief Data Officer and Information Quality Symposium.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION: 
- CDAiO Final Project: Submission by February 4, 2025. Includes a written project and a presentation (5-6 slides, 10-15 minutes).
- Estimated effort: 30 hours.
- Course materials available on Drive for 3 months post-course.
- Intellectual property rights belong to lecturers/university, for personal use only.

Thank you for choosing the CDO – CDAiO course!
